channel.title: TRIP IN KOREA
channel.desc: ?Trip in Korea? takes you on a five-star local journey with Korean actor Oh Ji-ho and trot singer Shin Seong, exploring hidden gems and unique experiences that reveal a fresh side of Korea.? VOD service is currently not available due to copyright issues.

channel.title: DISCOVERING KOREA: ATTRACTION
channel.desc: ?Discovering Korea? is a travel information program that delivers specific tourism information about Korean destinations including food, attractions and scenery etc. Throughout this program, it promotes Korean culture and conducts global tourism marketing promotion.
